title: Worst ever
review: I got dragged to this movie because my girlfriend's teenagers needed to be with an adult to get in. It should never have made it past the film festivals. It's like a group of middle schoolers sneaked their parents video camera out of the house and goofed around with it all weekend. If we didn't have to drive the kids home I would have walked out very early. It starts bad and it gets worse. Anybody who got scared by this must hear a lot of bumps in the night. Amateurish and definitely boring.
